document_data.Personality: Though he was opinionated and vain, Melf dedicated much of his life to fighting the forces of [[evil]].
document_data.Possessions: Melf fought with and owned a [[magic]]al [[spear]] and [[shield]], a ''[[cloak of illusions]]'', ''[[elven chainmail]]'', a [[spellbook]], and an exploding meteor.
document_data.History:
In [[1364 DR]], [[Robillard]] of the ''[[Sea Sprite]]'' and [[Harkle Harpell]] of [[Longsaddle]] engaged in a spellcasting competition. When Harkle took out the [[material component]]s for ''Melf's acid arrow'', Robillard recognized the spell instantly, and said that he knew Melf. Harkle was surprised and asked his age, and Robillard clarified that he didn't know him personally, but was familiar with his work. Robillard then cast ''Melf's minute meteors'' and Harkle commented "Better Melf".
